# imgix Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    imgix = {
      source = "journey.travel/terraform-providers/imgix"
      version = "1.0.0"
    }
  }
}

provider "imgix" {}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- **api_key** (String) Imgix API key. Can also be sourced from IMGIX_API_KEY environment variable
